title: Every plot meant for a recreational open space shall have an independent means of access
clause_text: Every plot meant for a recreational open space shall have an independent means of access. In case of group housing scheme, if such recreational open space is surrounded by or located along buildings and is meant for use by the occupants of those buildings, then independent means of access may not be insisted upon.
section: Recreational Open Space and Means of Access

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
